Hello. Could I get some help with instal: List your problem instead of just asking
what string of letters is it? (like -rwx-----) or something like that
running something as root requires typing "sudo" before and giving it your password
like "sudo sh NVIDIA bla bla" and then enter your password
to install those drivers you need to not be using the graphical interface
so you'll have to type "sudo killall xorg" to kill the graphics user interface (i.e. the desktop)
that will launch you back to a black and white text screen, there run the same thing
hit ctrl+alt+F2 to come to the console (black and white text screen), login there and do sudo killall xorg
and then the sudo sh NVIDIA--
I'm impressed, most new Linux users would've given up by now and reinstalled XP :)
